mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cafe (cafeNum, userNum, cafeName, cafeTel, cafeOwner, cafeIntro, sido, sigungu, bname, roadAddr, normAddr, buildName, detailAddr, bCode, cafeOpen, cafeClose) VALUES(#{cafeNum}, #{userNum}, #{cafeName}, #{cafeTel}, #{cafeOwner}, #{cafeIntro}, #{sido}, #{sigungu}, #{bname}, #{roadAddr}, #{normAddr}, #{buildName}, #{detailAddr}, #{bCode}, #{cafeOpen}, #{cafeClose})
INSERT INTO cafeFile(cafeNum, imgFilename, saveFilename) VALUES(#{cafeNum}, #{imgFilename}, #{saveFilename} )
INSERT INTO cafeRoom (roomNum, cafeNum, roomName, minUser, maxUser, timeOrRoom, unitPrice) VALUES(#{roomNum},#{cafeNum}, #{roomName}, #{minUser}, #{maxUser}, #{timeOrRoom}, #{unitPrice})
mapper.select:
SELECT cafeNum, userNum, cafeName, cafeIntro, sido, sigungu, bname, roadAddr, bCode FROM cafe
ORDER BY cafeNum DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{rows}
SELECT cafeNum, userNum, cafeName, cafeTel, cafeOwner, cafeIntro, sido, sigungu, bname, roadAddr, normAddr, buildName, detailAddr, bCode, cafeOpen, cafeClose FROM cafe WHERE cafeNum=#{cafeNum}
